clumpy.scenario.TransitionMatrix¶

class clumpy.scenario.TransitionMatrix(M, palette_u=None, palette_v=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Define a transition matrix.

Parameters

  • M (array-like of shape (n_initial_states, n_final_states)) – The transition matrix values.

  • palette_u (Palette) – List of initial states.

  • palette_v (Palette) – List of final states.

Methods

copy()

Make a copy.

get(info_u, info_v)

Get a probability.

get_P_v(info_u)

Get all transition probabilities from a given initial state.

multisteps(n)

Computes multisteps transition matrix.

patches(patches)

Computes a new transition matrix according to patches parameters.

select_all_u(info_u)

Select a new transition probabilities object for a given initial state.

set_value(a, info_u, info_v)

Set a transition probability value.
copy()[source]¶

Make a copy.

Returns

tm – The copy.

Return type

TransitionMatrix

get(info_u, info_v)[source]¶

Get a probability.

Parameters

  • info_u (State or int or str) – The initial state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

  • info_v (State or int or str) – The final state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

Returns

p – The requested probability.

Return type

float

get_P_v(info_u)[source]¶

Get all transition probabilities from a given initial state.

Parameters

info_u (State or int or str) – The initial state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

Returns

  • P_v (ndarray of shape (n_final_states,)) – The requested transition probabilities.

  • palette_v (Palette) – The corresponding final states palette.

multisteps(n)[source]¶

Computes multisteps transition matrix.

Parameters

n (int) – Number of steps.

Returns

tm – The computed multistep transition matrix.

Return type

TransitionMatrix

patches(patches)[source]¶

Computes a new transition matrix according to patches parameters.

Parameters

patches (TYPE) – DESCRIPTION.

Returns

tm – The transition matrix computed according to patches.

Return type

TransitionMatrix

select_all_u(info_u)[source]¶

Select a new transition probabilities object for a given initial state.

Parameters

info_u (State or int or str) – The initial state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

Returns

tm – The selected transition matrix object.

Return type

TransitionMatrix

set_value(a, info_u, info_v)[source]¶

Set a transition probability value.

Parameters

  • a (float) – The transition probability value.

  • info_u (State or int or str) – The initial state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.

  • v (State or int or str) – The final state information which can be the object, the state’s value or the state’s label. If two states share the same label, only the first one to occur is returned.
